com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.synchronization

Class ClusterNodesInSynchronizationOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.synchronization.ClusterNodesInSynchronizationOrder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ClusterNode>

    public final class ClusterNodesInSynchronizationOrder
extends Object
implements Iterable<ClusterNode>
    Class which calculates which ClusterNodes should be included in a synchronization pass and in which order they should be contacted.
